description: A tartly sweet and flavoursome sorbet.
keywords: Sorbet,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Passionfruit Sorbet Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a saucepan and melt the sugar into the water with the lemon zest from 1 lemon for 5 minutes and allow to cool fully.
Blend the passionfruit flesh until smooth.
Once the sugar water has melted, combine with the lemon juice and passionfruit.
Place into a freezer suitable container and place in the freezer for 4 hours. Take out every 30 minutes to mash the mixture up and keep it loose.
Once its cold enough to serve, scoop into serving bowls.
